ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67659-3" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69464-6" EMS level of service (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSLevelOfService 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.70 STATIC
